p:
We analyzed 7 BrQ-treated and 9 BrQ-free parasites. In BrQ-treated parasites, we identify distinct areas of Br overlaying hemozoin ( Figs. 1 and 3 A ). In BrQ-free parasites there is no such overlay ( Fig. 3 B ). However, the difference in overlay is not always as clear to the naked eye as shown in other examples given in
SI Appendix, Fig. S6 . We have taken up this challenge by quantifying the extent of overlap of Br with hemozoin in BrQ-treated and BrQ-free parasites. This extent is given in form of an overlap parameter O
Br,Hz . When there is no overlap O
Br,Hz = 0. In case there is an overlap O
Br,Hz > 0. The overlap parameter for several BrQ-treated and BrQ-free parasites is plotted in Fig. 3 C . The exact definition and calculation of the overlap parameter are presented in
SI Appendix, section 9 .
